channel.title: lists on things james does
channel.description: Recent content in lists on things james does

item.title: movies
item.author: james@jamesbvaughan.com (James Vaughan)
item.description: I watch a lot of movies. If you want to track every single movie I watch, you can do that on my Letterboxd profile. If you are just interested in knowing what my favorite movies are, then you’re in the right place. If you don’t care about what movies I watch, then you should probably go somewhere else. My favorite movies I’d like to preface this section by saying that I make a distinction between what I believe to be the “best” movies and what are my “favorite” movies.

item.title: podcasts
item.author: james@jamesbvaughan.com (James Vaughan)
item.description: I think podcasts are really cool. You can listen to them and learn or be entertained or both in a lot of situations where you can’t easily read a book or do real work. I spend a lot of time walking, which makes for a lot of time to listen to podcasts. My favorite podcasts I try to maintain a balance of podcasts that teach me new and interesting things and podcasts that are mostly entertainment.
